Minos being a microservices’ framework, it’s very important to support a REST port to access it. Thus, Minos REST Handler keeps a REST server active for clients to consume its endpoints.

Configured through decorators¶

REST endpoints’ handlers are bind to endpoints using Python decorators, as in Flask, FastAPI and the like.
